name: Shark Attack (itch) (nfacsmechs)
description:
Kill all the Alien ships without dying. Dying will cause you to have to restart the game. Kill the alien ships to get 100 points. When 2,500 pints are achieved, then a boss is released. Kill the boss and then continue on to 10,000 points to win. You have 5 lives. Good Luck!

-Arrow keys allow you to move around.

-The Space bar allows you to shoot. 

-You have 5 lives if you lose all you die. Press "R" to respawn. 

-Get to a score of 10,000 to win.
